text:
It is very, very difficult to resolve ftp problems with the depend="true" flag
when there are no log statements for what ant is getting as the local and remote
timestamps.

Every time I attempt to "freshen" my ftp server with the new files, ant claims
that there are no files to transfer.  Unfortunately, I don't understand how it
is coming to this conclusion.  It would be most helpful to add log statements
each time the local and remote timestamps are compared.
creator: dan@mojavelinux.com
